summary: Ramkishen and Mamta have three sons Vivek , Prem and Vinod and a daughter Sangeeta. This family is part of a joint family whose close knit bond is challenged by a misunderstanding.
cast: Mohnish Bahl|Salman Khan|Saif Ali Khan|Tabu|Sonali Bendre|Karisma Kapoor|Neelam Kothari|Mahesh Thakur|Alok Nath|Reema Lagoo|Ajit Vachani|Sadashiv Amrapurkar|Himani Shivpuri|Rajeev Verma|Satish Shah|Dilip Dhawan|Shakti Kapoor|Dinesh Hingoo|Shammi|Sheela Sharma|Jayshree T.|Kalpana Iyer|Mallika|Huma Khan|Achyut Potdar|Jatin Kanakia|Sushil Johri|Naresh Kumar Sharma|Dheeraj Kapoor|Mahesh Bhatt|Aziz Amlani|Master Zakki|Master Hardik|Zoya Afroz|Master Bunty Kotak|Master Vinni Pachori|Baby Richa Madhusudan|Baby Sneha Rao|Master Yash Antani|Baby Shraddha Srivastav|Master Harsh Shah|Kunickaa Sadanand|Harbans Darshan M. Arora|Surendra Rahi
keywords: extended family|tradition|separation of brothers|family relationships|brother sister relationship
title: Hum Saath-Saath Hain: We Stand United
